name: TeamyMcTeamFace: Firework Festival
description:
Click on the firework box to launch fireworks!
Every person that comes to the firework show will pay your admission price - decide between investing in higher prices, or investing in advertisting so that more people attend. 
There is no audio, your speakers are working fine.

People who worked on the content:
UP2020479 - programming gameplay
UP960678 - 3D models and textures
UP2015320 - Pixel art & animations
UP2019758 - Demonstration video
UP2018653 - Menu scene assets + programming
